The post contains two photos of a woman: which were found to be authentic.
The post: s caption in Hindi language accuses Indian police of assaulting women and mentions Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath.
The same photos and caption were shared: indicating a widespread circulation of the claim.
Multiple sources: including a news article and a video from Indian news sites, corroborate the incident of a woman being assaulted by a group of men in Uttar Pradesh.
